Ad Text: Build innovative tech and efficient tools so we can deliver today and transform tomorrow.

Ready for a career with scale and impact? If you’re as passionate as we are about making a difference, explore our offshore wind roles.  
Power your career in engineering and help us achieve our ambition to be a net zero company by 2050 or sooner.
Looking for an opportunity to drive positive, lasting change in the energy sector? Join bp.
Experience a new era for trading & shipping and become one of the pioneers leading the mission to #NetZero #lifeatbp

The world’s first-ever transatlantic flight fuelled on 100% sustainable aviation fuel (SAF) by a commercial airline.
While today we keep people and goods moving around the world with conventional jet fuel, we're also working to scale up SAF, and this is just the next step on our SAF journey as bp transitions to become an integrated energy company.
Let us help your business transition to electric vehicles with fully funded, ultra-fast charging in convenient locations – plus discounted rates for your fleet drivers

Engineered TCR T cell therapy may provide breakthroughs in curing cancers or autoimmune diseases. Similar to CAR-T cell therapy, this approach uses the patient's own cells to provide long-term protection from disease. Read more about our antigen-specific TCR research tools! #tcr #cancerresearch

We’re offering your business the opportunity to host ultra-fast EV chargers on convenient sites, funded by us. 

As well as providing your business with annual rental income from public chargers on your hub, your fleet drivers will benefit from dedicated bays and discounted rates on charging across our UK network

Avoid the expense of EV charging infrastructure with bp pulse’s Host a Charger service. 
We’re inviting your business to host a charging hub, fully funded by us, that’ll provide your fleet drivers with dedicated bays and discounted charging rates.

Our host a charger service can benefit both your business and fleet drivers by:
Providing your business with fully-funded ultra-fast EV chargers on a convenient site, plus annual rental income from your hub’s public charging bays 
Providing your drivers with dedicated charging bays, plus discounted UK-wide charging across our network
Futureproof your skills in a more meaningful career in trading & shipping, as together we journey to #NetZero #lifeatbp
Become a public network partner and access fully-funded, ultra-fast EV charging in convenient locations for your fleet

Charging up and drilling down. Whilst today we’re mostly in oil & gas, we’re also working to roll out EV charging hubs and recently opened up the UK’s largest public hub in Birmingham. And, not or — that’s how we’re backing Britain.

Take a look at our LysA:trade_mark: Universal PARylation Assay Kit. Our in-house kit is a sandwich ELISA-based kit designed to measure and quantify the amount of total poly ADP-ribosylation present in cell extracts. The kit is ideal for cellular analysis of both PARP and PARG inhibitors and bridges the gap between biochemical assays and animal testing. Learn more!

We have entered into a solar power purchase agreement (PPA) with Microsoft in Poland – the first PPA for both companies in the country.  

This partnership will support Microsoft’s goal of achieving 100% renewable energy supply by 2025. :partying_face:

We’re a collaborative, caring team and together, at bp, where our ambition is to be a net zero company by 2050 or sooner and to help the world get to net zero – hydrogen and CCS play a key part in this plan. 

If you’ve got the skills and share our vision, we could be the perfect combination.

Experience a 100% chance of impactful decisions.

If you’re as passionate as we are about making a difference, explore our offshore wind roles. 

Power your career in a role with potential global impacts and help us achieve our ambition to be a net zero company by 2050 or sooner and help the world get to net zero.

When it comes to the world reaching net zero, two of the elements of success that will help bp play a role are hydrogen and CCS. 

We need diligent, responsible leaders to lead the way as the world works towards a more sustainable future. 

Join us at bp and help us to help the world decarbonize.

Would you like to join in creating the leading oil company?

Aker BP needs a diversity of skills, experience and mindsets. We like to be challenged and to think outside the box. On our team, you can be part of developing future oil and gas production, and simultaneously improve the entire industry.
We’re increasing investment in the transition to lower carbon energy – and keeping oil and gas flowing where it’s needed. And, not or.

At bp, we have a net zero ambition and we want to help get the world to net zero by harnessing the power of hydrogen and CCS. To do this we need people who are innovative, ambitious and driven. 

Join our team of forward-thinking, talented people and help us to help the world to decarbonize.
